phrases: All of the above have been expelled.
Ibusaki Shun, Aoki Daigo, Sato Shoji,
They have also all been expelled.
Do you guys really have time to worry about the others?
The one who was up against Aldini and Tadokoro-chan... was me.
I guess I will go ahead...
and dig in to Aldini's dish!
My third-stage exam was to present a dish that could make me say yum.
Yes, you are supposed to go head-to-head with members of the Elite Ten,
but nobody said it had to be a competition.
that means that at least you two survived.
All the other rebels that went on the other routes
Are we just supposed to take this lying down?!
Our friends and my brother have been taken down!
We are just supposed to sit here and do nothing?!
How can you be so calm?!
Well, I mean, they had a legit cooking battle and lost, right?
Yeah, that really sucks, but it is not like their opponent cheated or anything,
so what is the point of bad-mouthing them?
Well, you are right, but... even then
The members of the Elite Ten can do anything at the school, right?
Well, Hayama got expelled, so they are down one...
Oh, and I guess Nakiri's actually a member of the Elite Ten.
So that just means that we have to take four more seats.
Yukihira, what are you going on about?!
If we are able to win those seats,
we can overturn everything, including the expulsions.
We just need to take the majority of the seats on the Elite Ten.
I have to defeat a member of the Elite Ten?
A Shokugeki only happens if both parties agree.
Central would gain nothing by accepting,
even if they are confident that they could beat us.
They are actually expecting to win...
Anyway, let us go get some advice.
Could you give me a seat in the Elite Ten?
You always say the craziest things.
To think that is what you would say when things are like this...
Sadly, I am not going to be able to do that, no matter how much fun it sounds like.
I am sure you could do something.
Do not let it get to you too much, Nakiri-chan.
You should probably give up on your buddies.
It is true that Yukihira-kun's proposal is extremely unrealistic.
And in that case, I cannot worry about my reputation anymore.
If I go to my father directly and ask him to rescind everyone is expulsions...
I will go to my father right now
If you are looking for Director Azami, he is actually here right now.
He is been making rounds to the various test sites to check up on them.
If you want to talk to him, you should probably hurry.
He is about to fly off to the next testing site.
You are still hanging around that unsavory crowd?
You should stop being so stubborn.
After a few days, they will also be expelled.
That is, if no one else decides to take some liberties
with the rules of the exams again.
Kobayashi, you will be confined to your room at the next exam.
I mean, even if I do not kick them out, someone else will.
Regarding the students that failed the stage-three exams...
Could I ask that you be a little more merciful toward them?
we are just going to have to settle things plate to plate.
You sure like talking as though your ideas are the only correct ones,
but the fact that I am standing here right now
means you have not been able to prove that you are correct at all.
If you want to get rid of us that badly,
why do not you stop with these rigged tests,
and let us settle things once and for all.
Why do not we have an all-out battle for seats in the Elite Ten?
That is an absolutely ridiculous idea, even for you, Yukihira Soma-kun.
If you want to negotiate, you need to have something to wager.
No need to talk to my precious only son that way.
I heard you got your revenge on Shiomi's apprentice!
Why do you always randomly pop up from nowhere?!
You have grown up so much.
Sorry to butt in like this,
but we need to talk to your dad.
Nakamura, I would say Soma's idea is not half bad.
Why do not we have one of those?
A rare but traditional twist on the Shokugeki where groups of chefs clash...
Saiba-senpai, you clearly do not understand anything.
As soon as I took the director's seat from Senzaemon-dono,
What I am currently doing is nothing more than some cleanup.
Nothing you could offer would make it worth accepting your challenge.
I offered to become one of your little soldiers if we lose?
I will abandon all my ideas and beliefs
and become your servant to help you with your salvation or whatever.
Of course, that also means I will close down Yukihira for good.
Saiba-senpai, this makes me so happy.
Today is a wonderful day, a very good day.
Could you not talk as though you have already won?
We are going to win, no matter what!
We will get our friends back, and we will not let you to close down Yukihira Diner.
but I want to save everyone!
I look forward to our day of battle.
We can hash out the details another day.
Time to get started on your special training.
If we take on the Elite Ten right now, there is no way we are going to win.
That is why we are going to conserve our strength and prepare for battle.
It will be held on Rebun Island.
How in the world did any of this come about?
Inform the rest of the Elite Ten to continue their journey north.
We will wipe out the resistance once and for all at the final exam venue.
A just world where no chef will ever have to wander again...
I will save the culinary world and Totsuki.
Hey, Dad, are you seriously going to put Yukihira on the line?
First, you shut the place down, and now you are wagering it on a bet.
Could you have some respect for the place?
You actually do not think we are going to win?
You sure you are my son?
Of course we are going to win!
Sorry, this was the only leverage we had.
I should also probably apologize for all of this as well.
I was actually the one who arranged for Joichiro and Senzaemon-dono to be there today.
We have been working in secret for some time now to come up with a strategy.
Because we knew that if Joichiro was involved, Azami would accept the challenge.
I cannot blame you if you think we have been using you.
There is no need to apologize.
On the contrary, if you or Saiba-san had not intervened,
we would not have been able to get this Shokugeki at all.
We will not let the Azami Administration have their way!
I will do my best, too!
I need to start doing this now, or I will not be able to deal with the pressure!
I think it might be a little early to start doing that.
I guess you can have your Mezzaluna back.
I am going to get that back by beating you!
But it is sort of in the way.
You better be taking proper care of it.
They are worthy enough to entrust with Totsuki's future.
But, no, really, it is in the way.
By the way, do you all know about Team Shokugekis?
I have heard the general rules before.
As Joichiro-san mentioned earlier, it is a Shokugeki that is team versus team.
Members from each team randomly face off against each other.
Then the victors from each team will continue facing off with each other.
They will repeat that until one team still has victors and they win the match.
have elements that are clearly different from standard Shokugeki.
And that is the fact that teamwork will make or break this competition.
But when they face off, it is one-on-one, right?
In Team Shokugeki, you can help your teammates with their dishes.
While you are facing off with your opponent,
you can help your teammates if they need assistance,
which results in creating a better team.
Which basically means that you are all chefs,
but also your teammates' support staff.
So even if you do not stand a chance alone, if you and your team work well together,
your chances of beating the Elite Ten are not zero.
you need to strengthen your teamwork so it surpasses your opponents'.
Which means that tomorrow, you will be having a two-on-two mock battle.
First, let us evaluate all of your individual strengths, and then
All right, we are going to draw straws.
So, what should the punishment be for the losing team?
This is not about winning or losing.
Why do not we have the loser eat this gross new dish I just came up with?
I am starting to remember things...
After all that time you were missing, you finally called me,
but just said whatever you wanted to say and then hung up on me!
And you call yourself an adult?!
But Chef Dojima is always so calm...
If you have something to say, say it with your dish.
I was worried, since you immediately went back to your cabin.
I just did not know how to react.
I truly believe that from the bottom of my heart.
But in order for that to happen, we need to defeat the Elite Ten
Just the thought sends shivers of dread down my spine.
How are you doing, old man?
I heard that you stopped by the Polar Star Dormitory.
Were you able to talk with your son?
I am looking forward to what he might do in the future.
I had no intention of having Soma enroll in Totsuki to begin with.
I only did because you were so pushy.
What brings you back to Japan?
Azami's been making some ominous movements.
In these past few years, he is suddenly been developing some connections in Asia.
It is easy to speculate that he will probably try to contact Totsuki
Erina still has fear of that man deep within her heart.
He will probably try to take advantage of that and seize control of her.
I would like to come up with some kind of plan.
No matter what we do, it will not be a fundamental solution.
The only ones who can truly save your granddaughter
will probably be classmates whom she can fight alongside.
There is a few minor details we need to discuss.
We will conduct a three-on-three mock battle!
Come on, we do not need to be so serious.
Let us just take this lightly.
Do you have any idea how many times that flippant attitude of yours caused me grief?!
Yeah, and that is why I said I will take you up on a challenge as part of the training.
But let us do our best together.
We want to save Arato-san and the others, too.
And to think I have not even strengthened my resolve to face my father yet.
Tadokoro Megumi, Takumi Aldini, and Dojima Gin.
Yukihira Soma, Nakiri Erina, and Saiba Joichiro.
The team leaders will be Gin and Joichiro.
The other two on each team will support the preparations.
You better not think of me as a student still, Joichiro.
Nakiri-san and Soma-kun are on the other side.
I need to make sure I do not hold Chef Dojima and Takumi-kun back!
I am on the same team as Saiba-sama, whom I have admired for so long...
I have to do everything I can to assist him.
Thank you for letting us use your kitchen, Conductor.
The dish both of your teams will be making is hachis Parmentier,
I heard of that back at Master Shinomiya's.
It is a dish made with meat sauce, cheese, and pomme pureebasically mashed potatoes
A dish where various steps of the preparation are very time consuming...
Even with three of us, we can barely make it in fifty minutes.
If the chef does not split up the duties efficiently, we will not make it in time.
As for the rules, you may not say a single word to each other while cooking.
This is the same as being blindfolded!
Takumi-kun, how did you know what Chef Dojima was thinking just now?
in this mock battle from any other time we have cooked.
Think of all of the techniques in my head and invert them...
Watch what the chef is doing carefully...
Just like all the times I have supported Soma-kun,
think about what is going to happen next...
Looks like they have cleared the first hurdle.
You need to match your movements more with mine!
Quit doing steps completely out of order from the basic recipe!
You are supposed to be my support!
And stop messing up my hair!
I will not hesitate to disqualify you.
But you know, we had our utensils down and we were not cooking,
so we should be safe, right?!
I will not accept excuses like that.
You will not get another chance.
Otherwise, this would not count as training.
We do not have time to argue with each other!
Saiba-sama is the leader, so we should be doing everything we can to support
As if this did not concern you!
But seriously, why is my dad making whatever he wants to right now?
That is been concerning me, too.
The star of hachis Parmentier is the meat sauce.
After frying the meat and herbs,
you add in red wine and bullion for vivid richness and flavor.
It is the step that takes the longest.
And yet Saiba-sama had started with the other steps.
Why is not he following the basic steps like Chef Dojima?
Those are not ingredients used in this dish.
In France, hachis Parmentier is usually served in a gratin dish.
But since he is going to be serving it on a normal plate...
What Chef Dojima is trying to make right now
is what would be served in restaurants...
A true gourmand's original hachis Parmentier.
Please watch from a slight distance next time, too.
